name: Intelliment Security
tag_list: intelligent-automation-software, security-policies, network-security, cloud-computing, sdn, cloud
overview:
We are building a disruptive intelligent automation software for the management and provision of security policies. We do Software-defined security but in any network infrastructure: on-premise, cloud, virtual, SDN. With our management software you can finally focus on what really matters: the security and regulatory compliance of your network infrastructure security. We take care of the automation of everything else.

Intelligent Security Policy Management
